How to Play

  • Move your blocks, with your mouse, to try and block the ball
  • Click "Another Brick", if you need more to block it
  • The ball will randomely drop, then you won't be able to move the blocks
  • You lose if the ball hits the bottom of the screen
  • You win if it successfully hits the top of the screen
